Name: mal-cheriyamundamab-la
Author: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed And Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor

Translations.Text: anakkarekkeant ninre raksitav pravartticcat ennane enn ni kantille
kuttankuttamayikkeantulla paksikale avarute nerkk avan ayakkukayum ceytu
annane avan avare tinneatukkappetta vaikkeal turumpupealeyakki
